CustomField.description: Used to link to record within the List view and Compact Layout
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Account__c)), HYPERLINK("/" & Account__r.Id, Account__r.Name, "_self"), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Contact__c)), HYPERLINK("/" & Contact__r.Id, Contact__r.FirstName & " " & Contact__r.LastName , "_self"), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity__c)), HYPERLINK("/" & Opportunity__r.Id, Opportunity__r.Name, "_self"), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Lead__c)), HYPERLINK("/" & Lead__r.Id, Lead__r.FirstName & " " & Lead__r.LastName , "_self"), "No Record" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Excluded Record
